title: Circus Fever
description: When kids are little everything is a mystery to them. Some things are very exciting and scary all at the same time. For some reason, many children are fearful of clowns, painted faces and costumes.Not for Jessica, in CIRCUS FEVER though. She loves clowns and often times finds herself in her bedroom playing dress up and having all kinds of fun! This fun adventure takes Jessica right to the BIG TOP with animals, acrobats, and clowns. Step right up and join Jessica in CIRCUS FEVER!
author: Alva Sachs
